## Node.Traversal.nested variable

When set, traverse all nested browsing contexts encountered.

[https://html.spec.whatwg.org/\#nested-browsing-context](https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#nested-browsing-context)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
nested: Flag
```
